episodes.title: The NXIVM cult: Allison Mack does her first interview. Victim, perpetrator, or both?
episodes.description:
In this video, I chat about the first and only interview that Allison Mack has done since being released from prison, and the questions that it raises for us as a society to grapple with.
Check out the podcast series which features the interview with Allison here:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLuMdLmjdG8dcaZM_sTC-HrbLQyT09sQIu

episodes.title: Feds raid the headquarters of 7M TikTok Cult / Shekinah Church
episodes.description:
Hopefully we are about to see some justice being served in relation to this cult. Sources linked below:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LDfzVA1LJv0

https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2025-07-25/feds-raid-tujunga-home-of-alleged-tiktok-cult-pastor-in-sex-trafficking-investigation

https://www.instagram.com/exposing7m/

episodes.title: The NXIVM Cult part 4: The Disappearance of Kristin Snyder
episodes.description:
Resources for those interested in learning more about meditation induced psychosis:

https://www.esquire.com/uk/latest-news/a25651175/the-other-side-of-paradise-how-i-left-a-buddhist-retreat-in-handcuffs/
https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC8380174/
https://theconversation.com/meditation-can-be-harmful-and-can-even-make-mental-health-problems-worse-230435

episodes.title: The NXIVM Cult part 3 - Examining Keith Raniere's manipulative phone calls from prison
episodes.description: This video looks at the first episode of "Raniere speaks", a podcast which Keith Raniere put out while in prison, and his attempts to victimise himself.

episodes.title: The NXIVM Cult part 2: How the concept of collateral was twisted
episodes.description: This is part 2 of my series about NXIVM/DOS, and I examine an article written by a group of women still loyal to Keith Raniere and the DOS ideology that has to do with the concept of collateral.

episodes.title: Examining undue influence: Keith Raniere & Allison Mack discuss authenticity - NXIVM Cult part 1
episodes.description: This is the first in what I hope will be a series of videos examining the undue influence wielded by NXIVM cult leader Keith Raniere.
